pr_title: HBASE-21596 Delete for a specific cell version can bring back version…

timeline.message: HBASE-21596 Delete for a specific cell version can bring back versions above VERSIONS limit

timeline.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: Had not done previously because original method modified was package private. Doing now.
replies.author: wchevreuil

timeline.bodyText: nit: we can wrap it with ArrayList constructor: new ArrayList<>(deleteCells);
timeline.author: virajjasani
virajjasani

timeline.bodyText: Should we not deepClone cell, update timestamp and then add that cloned cell to cells list similar to above branch?
timeline.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: It's been a while since I originally proposed this patch, but IIRC we don't need it here, because there's no extra version to fabricate a new delete marker.
replies.author: wchevreuil

timeline.author: virajjasani

timeline.message: Fixing previous failed tests and addressing review comments

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if sorting of result is required here. If not required, rest looks good.
timeline.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: It's not needed, because we don't have to worry about additional versions, we only need to put a single marker for current TS.
replies.author: wchevreuil
